title: Sarbishe Basaltic Columns
content: Gurit mine is located near the township of Sarbishé in Birjand. ln this mine, there are beautiful outcrops of hexagon basalt columns (Andesite Basalt) over which a cream layer can be seen. A characteristic oi these columns is their bendings in some parts which has given them a graceful landscape. Basalt columns of Sarbishé are now extracted to be used in various construction works. The age of Sarbishe Basalt Columns dates back to neogen period.
